_header: Jesu Christ to whom we call / Said to his disciples all
_description: Gospel, ‘In festo sancte Margarete’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
IHesu crist to whom we calleSeide to his disciples
                    alle…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…In þat blisse briht schynyngeIhesu lord vs þider
                    bringe. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title: Simile est regum celorum thesauro ab (f. 222vb)
